title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Social Constructivist Communication for Blended and Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners engage in meaningful interactions with peers on scientific topics in online discussion forums at least three times, achieving over 80% feedback incorporation.
Learners allocate over 30% of total learning time to communication activities (online/offline) in blended learning environments to enhance academic persistence.
Through peer assessment and collaborative tasks, learners identify at least two logical flaws in scientific experiment designs and propose improvements.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
